articles.title: Nargis Fakhri and Uday Chopra dated for five years, actress says wanted to tell everyone - India Today
articles.description: Nargis Fakhri has revealed that she and Uday Chopra dated for five years. She also said that she didn't want to keep her relationship a secret.
